name: Don`t Let Them Pass!
description: Hello everyone, this is a new Tower Defense game. A lot of time and effort, as well as resources were spent on this game.The game is scheduled for release in November 2022. And you may have noticed 2 archives: free and paid. New monsters will be waiting for you in the paid one, as well as skins for towers will be added in the near future. Why the paid version? The answer is extremely simple. All the money that will be received from the game will be spent on the development of the next grand game. See you soon in devlogs!!
